meaningMnemonic:
Four tens plus two. That equals <vocabulary>forty two</vocabulary>. 

P.S. Please don't panic. "<vocabulary>The Answer</vocabulary>" is NOT a correct answer for this. It is just a reference to the greatest book of all time. Sorry for the confusion and so long and thanks for all the fish.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. But! Don't forget, 四 uses the kun'yomi reading, since the on'yomi reading sounds too much like the word for "death."
